name: GetSprite2DRegion

inputs.name: IFTransform2d
inputs.description: Connect a transfrom2d component to this port

inputs.name: Camera
inputs.description: The camera looking at this 2D object

outputs.name: Triggered
outputs.description: Trigger next node when current node executed

description: Get a 2D object's rectangle in normalized coordinates on the screen (XYWH)
